lore: Chimeras are very different from each other, yet they all share a common goalâ€”to protect T'mere M'rgo's creations from the criminals who seek to capture them.\n\nThe Blessed Chimera is so intense that its siblings often find it irritating. It keeps talking about the importance of their mission until other Chimeras get away from it, so Blessed Chimeras mostly interact among themselves. They detest all intelligent creatures outside the Amalgam Gardens, as they believe they would all plunder T'mere's realm if they were not so scared.
menagerieDialog: (Such a horrifying yet fascinating creature... you don't want to look, but you can't seem to tear your gaze away from it.)
(This creature is clearly the product of a sick and twisted mind.)
(This creature inspires you to think about what would happen if Torun fused himself with a Dumpling.)
(Despite its horrifying appearance, this creature's steadfast loyalty to you and your kingdom is unquestionable.)
name: Blessed Chimera
